## PreflightTest.addListener() method

Connected event. Raised when the PreflightTest has successfully connected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(connectedEvent: PreflightTest.Event.Connected, listener: PreflightTest.Listener.Connected): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connectedEvent | [PreflightTest.Event.Connected](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [PreflightTest.Listener.Connected](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.listener_namespace.connected_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The PreflightTest object.

## Example


```typescript
preflightTest.addListener(PreflightTest.Event.Connected, () => {
  // preflightTest has been connected
});
```
